pkgmetadata.longdescription:
psyclpc is a programming language for intense multi-user network applications such as psyced. it's a recent fork of LDMud with some features and many bug fixes. we kept it compatible to LDMud, so you can run a MUD with it, too. It is available from .
LDMud itself is a continuation of the Amylaar LPMud Gamedriver 3.1.2. See also .
psyclpc is released under the GNU LIBRARY GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE, Version 2.
